title: Communications Services Flat on Rotation Into Value Stocks — Communications Services Roundup
text:
Communications services companies were more or less flat as traders rotated out of "growth" stocks, which trade at high valuations compared with earnings, and into value stocks.

Shares of Facebook and Amazon.com, two of the leading growth stocks during the bull market, fell Tuesday.

The impending rollout of "fifth generation" cell-phone data networks worldwide should benefit Scandinavian telecom equipment makers Ericsson and Nokia, said analysts at one brokerage, with both likely to see revenue growth from the 5G cycle. "We see signs of continued 5G investments from [telecom companies] further helped by increasing number of 5G smartphone launches, 5G spectrum auctions/allocations and continued 5G positive comments from chip vendors," said analysts at brokerage Credit Suisse, in a note to clients.
